trans-unit.source: Represents a pop-up menu that enables a control to expose functionality that is specific to the context of the control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um menu de pop-up que permite um controlo para expor a funcionalidade que é específica para o contexto do controlo.

trans-unit.source: ContextMenu is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: ContextMenu é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, que significa pode conter uma coleção de objetos de qualquer tipo (como cadeia, a imagem ou o painel).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: The properties of the ContextMenu class are used to define the position and behavior of the ContextMenu.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades da classe ContextMenu são utilizadas para definir a posição e o comportamento do ContextMenu.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> can have a ContextMenu.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>ou <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>pode ter um ContextMenu.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: If you assign a ContextMenu to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> class handles context menu operations in response to user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Se atribuir um ContextMenu para o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>classe processa operações de menu de contexto em resposta a interação do utilizador.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Part of the work the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> does is opening the ContextMenu when the user clicks the right mouse button over the control.
trans-unit.target: Parte do trabalho de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>does está a abrir o ContextMenu quando o utilizador clica no botão direito do rato sobre o controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>

trans-unit.source: The following properties are defined by the ContextMenu and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> classes.
trans-unit.target: As seguintes propriedades são definidas pelo ContextMenu e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>classes.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>

trans-unit.source: If any of these properties are set on both ContextMenu and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>, the property value from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> is used.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer uma destas propriedades forem definidas em ambos os ContextMenu e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>, o valor da propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>é utilizado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTargetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow%2A> A ContextMenu is automatically placed inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTargetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow%2A>A ContextMenu automaticamente é colocado dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTargetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: This behavior cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível alterar este comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ContextMenu Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ContextMenu controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Personalizar o ContextMenu controlo para aplicar as mesmas definições de propriedade para vários ContextMenu controlos, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Pode modificar a predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para lhe dar controlo um aspeto exclusivo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [personalizar o aspeto de um controlo existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ContextMenu, see [ContextMenu Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e Estados que são específicos para o ContextMenu, consulte [ContextMenu estilos e modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controlo podem ser definidas pelo estilo de predefinido do controlo.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo predefinido, a propriedade poderá alterar o valor predefinido do quando o controlo é apresentado na aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo predefinido é determinado pelo qual tema de ambiente de trabalho é utilizado quando a aplicação está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [predefinido o WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ContextMenu control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definir uma propriedade visual apenas terá um efeito se essa propriedade ambos presentes no modelo de predefinido do controlo de ContextMenu e é definida através da utilização de um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na secção "Alterar o Visual estrutura de um controlo" [personalizar o aspeto de um controlo existente, criando um ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a particular instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> closes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma instância específica de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> fecha.

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # Encaminhados informações sobre eventos ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Estratégia de encaminhamento | Bubbling | | Delegado | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"> </xref> evento encaminhado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a callback that indicates where a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> should be placed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma chamada de retorno indica onde uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> devem ser colocados no ecrã.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> for the callback delegate to be used.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>propriedade tem de ser definida como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>para o delegado de chamada de retorno ser utilizado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback> delegate returns an array of possible points that are defined with respect to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback>delegado devolve uma matriz de possíveis pontos que estão definidas no que respeita à <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback>

trans-unit.source: When the context menu is displayed, a point is chosen that maximizes the amount of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> window that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Quando for apresentado o menu de contexto, um ponto é escolhido que maximiza a quantidade do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>janela está visível.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The behavior is the same as it is for the popup.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento é o mesmo é para o pop-up.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Specify a Custom Popup Position](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Popup Placement Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: Especifique uma posição de pop-up personalizada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [exemplo de posicionamento de pop-up](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: A callback that specifies the location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada de retorno que especifica a localização do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.CustomPopupPlacementCallback*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.CustomPopupPlacementCallback*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.CustomPopupPlacementCallback*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control supports scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controlo suporta deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: If the control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in its style and has a custom keyboard scrolling behavior, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> should return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o controlo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>no seu estilo e tem um teclado personalizado deslocamento comportamento, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A>deverá devolver `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the context menu appears with a dropped shadow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o menu de contexto é apresentado com uma sombra ignorada.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> opens, the value is set to the value of <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>se abre, o valor é definido para o valor de <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade como `true` não tem qualquer efeito se a <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é `false`.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the context menu appears with a dropped shadow; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o menu de contexto é apresentado com uma sombra ignorada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: Ponto de GET ou define a distância entre a origem de destino e o alinhamento de pop-up horizontal.

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, HorizontalOffset, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode posicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, HorizontalOffset, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: Estas propriedades comportar-se da mesma forma que para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [comportamento de colocação de pop-up](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum | # # Utilização de atributos de XAML ``` - or – ``` # # XAML valores *duplo* cadeia representação de um valor.

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: Isto é interpretado como um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] medida.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: As cadeias não tem de incluir explicitamente decimais.

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um valor de `1` é aceitável.

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply.
trans-unit.target: O mesmo <xref:System.Double>aplicam restrições de intervalo, tal como mencionado na secção de valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *duplo* valor, tal como descrito acima, seguido de uma das seguintes cadeias de declaração de unidade: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px **Note** In many cases a double may be set to Auto but a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> will not appear if the offsets are set to Auto.
trans-unit.target: `px`(predefinição) é [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` é polegadas; 1 in = = 96px `cm` é centímetros; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` é pontos; 1pt==(96/72) px **nota** em muitos casos, um valor de duplo pode ser definido para Auto, mas um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>não será apresentado se os desvios estão definidos como caracteres auto</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: A distância horizontal entre a origem de destino e o ponto de alinhamento de pop-up.

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre pontos de alinhamento de origem e de pop-up de destino, consulte [comportamento de colocação de pop-up](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> está visível.

trans-unit.source: When IsOpen is set to `true`, mouse capture is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> and its subtree.
trans-unit.target: Quando IsOpen está definida como `true`, captura do rato está definida como o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>e a respetiva subárvore.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`||

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> está visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"> </xref> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria e devolve um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"> </xref> objeto para este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reports that the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*> property changed.
trans-unit.target: Relatórios de que o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*>alterada de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Called when a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown"></xref> event is raised by an object inside the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando um <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown"> </xref> o evento é gerado por um objeto no interior do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Responde ao <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"> </xref> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Called when a context menu's visual parent changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando principal visual de um menu de contexto é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The object that the context menu was previously attached to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto menu de contexto foi anteriormente ligado ao.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a particular instance of a context menu opens.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma instância específica de um menu de contexto abre.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"> </xref> evento encaminhado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Placement property of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a propriedade de posicionamento de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> changes this value of this property when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> opens.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>está atribuído ao <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>Este valor desta propriedade é alterado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>abre.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If the user opens the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by using the mouse, Placement is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.
trans-unit.target: Se o utilizador abre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>utilizando o rato, colocação está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If the user opens the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by using the keyboard, Placement is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.
trans-unit.target: Se o utilizador abre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>utilizando o teclado, colocação está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender alterar a posição do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>defina a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade no <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>ou <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, Placement, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode posicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, colocação, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: Estas propriedades comportar-se da mesma forma que para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [comportamento de colocação de pop-up](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the area relative to which the context menu is positioned when it opens.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a área relativamente à qual o menu de contexto está posicionado quando é aberta.

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, PlacementRectangle, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>.</xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> changes this value of this property to the owning <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> opens.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>está atribuído ao <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>Este valor desta propriedade é alterado para o proprietário <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>ou <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>abre.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.target: Para utilizar um diferente <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o elemento especificado para mostrar o item especificado.

trans-unit.source: Preparing the element may involve applying styles, setting bindings, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Preparar o elemento pode envolver aplicação estilos, definição enlaces e assim sucessivamente.

trans-unit.source: Element used to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Elemento utilizado para apresentar o item especificado.

trans-unit.source: Specified item.
trans-unit.target: Item especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> should close automatically.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> deve fechar automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the menu should stay open until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*> property changes to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o menu deve permanecer aberto até o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>propriedade é alterado para <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: Ponto de GET ou define a distância entre a origem de destino e o alinhamento de pop-up vertical.

trans-unit.target: Pode posicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.target: Estas propriedades comportar-se da mesma forma que para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum | # # Utilização de atributos de XAML ``` - or – ``` # # XAML valores *duplo* cadeia representação de um valor.

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: Isto é interpretado como um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] medida.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: As cadeias não tem de incluir explicitamente decimais.

trans-unit.source: For instance, a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um valor de `1` é aceitável.

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply.
trans-unit.target: O mesmo <xref:System.Double>aplicam restrições de intervalo, tal como mencionado na secção de valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *duplo* valor, tal como descrito acima, seguido de uma das seguintes cadeias de declaração de unidade: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px > [!NOTE] > In many cases a double may be set to Auto, but a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> does not appear if the offsets are set to Auto.
trans-unit.target: `px`(predefinição) é [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` é polegadas; 1 in = = 96px `cm` é centímetros; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` é pontos; 1pt==(96/72) px > [!NOTE] > em muitos casos, um valor de duplo pode ser definido como automático, mas um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>não é apresentada se os desvios estão definidos como caracteres auto</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: A distância vertical entre a origem de destino e o ponto de alinhamento de pop-up.

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre pontos de alinhamento de origem e de pop-up de destino, consulte [comportamento de colocação de pop-up](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffset*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffset*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
